mJ-paE4EB_w-RyQU_.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mAxA-VeZBvE5JynnG.name: Tough Skin
mAxA-VeZBvE5JynnG.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

miQjJuk0qt0aVdmMV.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

mvkMvDiAtOCH8xP08.name: Oxygen Storage
mvkMvDiAtOCH8xP08.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mQvYzboWcdOl3XaNi.name: Oxygen Storage
mQvYzboWcdOl3XaNi.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

m_7xXvv7a6frDV0JD.name: Oxygen Storage
m_7xXvv7a6frDV0JD.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mS9JZS_htPvf51ki4.name: Oxygen Storage
mS9JZS_htPvf51ki4.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mamOlan_oTxG4X2mP.name: Oxygen Storage
mamOlan_oTxG4X2mP.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

tmoy5crZbrYh-0dSv.name: High Pain Threshold
tmoy5crZbrYh-0dSv.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

mncUt7Kx2GaPHbiRq.name: Diffuse
mncUt7Kx2GaPHbiRq.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mcmcEg3Ifbkf98FKP.name: Homogenous
mcmcEg3Ifbkf98FKP.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mWqCgNQQgKLqcE6sO.name: No Blood
mWqCgNQQgKLqcE6sO.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mrw8ml3QSMtCVMumg.name: No Brain
mrw8ml3QSMtCVMumg.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

micmgPAyeSXhtcT5J.name: No Eyes
micmgPAyeSXhtcT5J.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mAB3FB8TfWsDblX-F.name: No Head
mAB3FB8TfWsDblX-F.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mKUFiZ2v0gs0fVBFi.name: No Neck
mKUFiZ2v0gs0fVBFi.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mT4ems_KixyEX8ACh.name: No Vitals
mT4ems_KixyEX8ACh.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mUKBTAGM8XaVXpMds.name: Unliving
mUKBTAGM8XaVXpMds.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
